titles.title: Calling on the International Olympic Committee to designate a new venue for the 2014 Winter Olympic Games.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: 9/18/2008--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that the failure of the Russian government to respect the sovereignty and territorial borders of its neighbors has rendered the country an unacceptable host for the 2014 Winter Olympic Games. Urges the International Olympic Committee to designate a new host city.
